column4: hi i made mistake in ubuntu i want to remove my ftp server n i made "sudo apt-get remove ftp*" ?????  plz help me wt should i do ???
hi i made mistake in ubuntu i want to remove my ftp server n i made "sudo apt-get remove ftp*" ?????  plz help me wt should i do ???
what's the name of the package you want to remove?  if you don't remember, "dpkg --get-selections | grep ftp"
now my system is starting in only CUI mode n i dont know wt i do to fix it
what does that have to do with ftp (or dpkg --get-selections) ?  am confused
thesarge: if it's a vm, yeah :-)  that's probably why it was slow before.  because all the reads and writes have to be emulated
my firefox and many more application removed due to this command line
thesarge: which is why xvfb would be a lot faster since it's all software framebuffer, no driving hardware involved

thesarge: yeah, same thing :-)  vncserver implements a virtual framebuffer internally.  the reason vncserver is so big is because it is entire X server inside ;-)
